game.name: Tinker-World: Arrival at Kedhreon
game.shortDescription: Retro inspired turn-based RPG where you explore, trade, loot, craft, and fight in a grand adventure as a young vagabond in this captivating, steampunkish world. Pursue a better life, hopefully filled with riches, fame, romance, and power. Do it all in your own way. If not now, then never...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Retro inspired turn-based RPG where you explore, trade, loot, craft, and fight in a grand adventure as a young vagabond in this captivating, steampunkish world.
